Summary: Large glowing yellow light with orange ring the size of the moon disappeared after 10 minutes hovering
divs: Sighting DetailsInstalling a solar electric system after dusk when the entire four man crew witnessed a very large light over the power lines to the east, we assumed skeptically it was a radio tower then it vanished, the next day no tower was there. It was the size of the moon glowing statically, a very large light, then after 10 min or so it vanished.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Elkton
There were no other sightings in Elkton on or around December 13th 2012
